instructions: Combine all ingredients in a self-sealing plastic bag; seal bag and place in refrigerator 4 to 24 hours.
Remove steaks from marinade, discarding marinade.
Grill over medium-hot coals, 7 minutes per side, turning once.
title: Grilled Honey-Soy Pork Steaks
steps: Combine all ingredients in a self-sealing plastic bag; seal bag and place in refrigerator 4 to 24 hours. Remove steaks from marinade, discarding marinade. Grill over medium-hot coals, 7 minutes per side, turning once.
